wikipedia_page.main: Peter Griffiths  ((1862-09-00)September 1862 – ) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1884 and 1891, playing 6 matches. He played his first match on 9 February 1884 against Ireland and his last match on 7 February 1891 against Ireland.

response: Peter Griffiths (1928–2013) was a British politician.
Peter Griffiths may also refer to:
*Peter Griffiths, murderer of June Anne Devaney
